"I'll kill you!" he shouted, and seizing the marble top of a table with a strength he had never before felt, he made a step toward her brandishing the slab. 
Hlne's face became terrible, she shrieked and sprang aside. His father's nature showed itself in Pierre. He felt the fascination and de- light of frenzy. He flung down the slab, broke it, and swooping down on her with outstretched hands shouted, "Get out!" in such a terrible voice that the whole house heard it with hor- ror. Go
